snippet: In addition to Bach’s “Goldberg” Variations, the recital offered Webern’s Variations for Piano (Op. 27) and Brahms’s Variations and Fugue on a Theme by Handel (Op. 24).
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews performance by pianist Minsoo Sohn at Zankel Hall.
lead_paragraph: In addition to Bach’s “Goldberg” Variations, the recital offered Webern’s Variations for Piano (Op. 27) and Brahms’s Variations and Fugue on a Theme by Handel (Op. 24).

headline.seo: The Honens Winner Minsoo Sohn Performs at Zankel Hall
headline.main: Riding Into Carnegie Hall on a Masterpiece by Bach
headline.print_headline: Riding Into Carnegie Hall On a Masterpiece by Bach
